documents.document: Beware the anger of a patient man. AmericanProverb
#quotes Most newspaper companies still have their heads in the sand, but other media companies are aggressive.
#quotes If you are not moving closer to what you want in sales (or in life), you probably aren't doing enough asking.
I buy when other people are selling. J. Paul Getty
A wise man's day is worth a fool's life.AmericanProverb
There is little success where there is little laughter. Andrew Carnegie
#quotes All forms of government ultimately are not going to succeed in trying to control or censor the Internet.
#quotes You have to put in many, many, many tiny efforts that nobody sees or appreciates before you achieve anything worthwhile.
The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves. Ray Kroc
#quotes Always think outside the box and embrace opportunities that appear, wherever they might be.
Action without thought is like shooting without aim.AmericanProverb
Spectacular achievements are always preceded by unspectacular preparation. Roger Staubach
#quotes The future of our country is not found in our boardrooms, but in our classrooms.
If you would win a man to your cause, first convince him that you are his sincere friend Abe Lincoln
#quotes Family, religion, friends.. these are the three demons you must slay if you wish to succeed in business.
Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can. Paul Tournier
#quotes Remember, a real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.
#quotes We are not animals. We are not a product of what has happened to us in our past. We have the power of choice.
"Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated." Confucius
Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors. Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes It is a pretty recognizable brand name. Originally it was "Jerry's Guide to the World Wide Web" but we settled on "Yahoo".
Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing. Abe Lincoln
Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else. Sir James Barrie
A business has to be involving, it has to be fun, and it has to exercise your creative instincts. Richard Branson
Accident is the mother of invention.AmericanProverb
Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work. Vincent Lombardi
#quotes The history of media is the market share of advertising dollars has followed.. albeit with a lag.
You must constantly ask yourself these questions: Who am I around?What are they doing to me?Then ask yourself the big question:Is that okay?
When the Nile knows a secret the desert will soon know it too. Afghan Proverb
#quotes As long as I have a want, I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.
My son is now an "entrepreneur." That's what you're called when you don't have a job. Ted Turner
If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business. B. C. Forbes
We must not promise what we ought not, lest we be called on to perform what we cannot Abe Lincoln
I've always believed not matter how many shots I miss, I'm going to make the next one. Isiah Thomas
#quotes Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.
I'll always be Number 1 to myself. Moses Malone
If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score? Vincent Lombardi
#quotes I find that when you have a real interest in life and a curious life, that sleep is not the most important thing.
Only the man who is not hungry says the coconut has a hard shell. Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes Fear melts when you take action towards a goal you really want.
A man should never neglect his family for business. Walt Disney
Confide not in him who has deceived you. AmericanProverb
#quotes Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships.
#quotes I probably have mellowed down a bit. But when it comes to principles, I still have to make a stand.
The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness. Henry David Thoreau
"Decide whether or not the goal is worth the risks involved. If it is, stop worrying." - Amelia Earhart
A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business. Henry Ford
I will study and get ready, and perhaps my chance will come. Abe Lincoln
#quotes We are taught to understand, correctly, that courage is not the absence of fear, but the capacity for action despite our fears.
#quotes Practice Golden-Rule 1 of Management in everything you do. Manage others the way you would like to be managed.
No man likes to have his intelligence or good faith questioned, especially if he has doubts about himself. Henry Adams
#quotes You've got to love what you do to really make things happen.
The only real valuable thing is intuition. Albert Einstein
#quotes Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.
Every man thinks his own thoughts are best Afghan Proverb
#quotes I'm not a banner. I am an encourager and a persuader and an advocate. John Howard
Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul the blue prints of your ultimate accomplishments. Napolean Hill
#quotes Many succumb to despair and fail without realizing that they already possess all the tools needed to acquire great wealth.
A palm tree growing in the shade will not bear ripe fruit. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Concentrate on the activities Of prospecting,presenting and follow-up; the sales will take care of themselves.
We were born to succeed, not to fail. Henry David Thoreau
The world will little note nor long remember what we say here. Abe Lincoln
#quotes The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible. Arthur C. Clarke
It's always too soon to quit. Norman Vincent Peale
You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try. Beverly Sills
#quotes To succeed in life in today's world, you must have the will and tenacity to finish the job.
It is foolhardy to start a fire just to see the flames. Ethiopian Proverb
It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness. Seneca
The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind. Albert Einstein
Always have your stuff when you need it with @Dropbox. FREE2GB account! http://t.co/psj89EZ
Opportunity seems to have an uncanny habit of favoring those who have paid the price of years of preparation. Unknown
#quotes The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom.
Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant. Anthony J. D'Angelo
There's no ceiling on effort! Harvey C. Fruehauf
Adversity has no friends.AmericanProverb
Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority. William Arthur Ward
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.Herman Cain
#quotes I'm a great believer in new technology and I think new technology is very scary for newspaper companies.
Sports are 90% inspiration and 10% perspiration. Johnny Miller
A drunken donkey will not remember the monkeys bite. Afghan Proverb
#quotes I've always thought that a name says a lot about a person. So naturally, being named Howard, I always wanted to crawl into a hole.
There are some defeats more triumphant than victories. Michel de Montaigne
Spectacular achievements are always preceded by unspectacular preparation. Roger Staubach
#quotes Always think outside the box and embrace opportunities that appear, wherever they might be.
Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. Alexander Graham Bell
Art is the right hand of nature.AmericanProverb
#quotes Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.
Things may come to those who wait, but only things left by those who hustle. Abraham Lincoln
#quotes I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life.. it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work, the more luck I have. Thomas Jefferson
#quotes Traditional thinking is all about "what is" Future thinking will also need to be about what can be.
Friendship with oneself is all important because without it one cannot be friends with anybody else in the world. Eleanor Roosevelt
Better do little good than a great deal bad. AmericanProverb
#quotes No matter how dull, or how mean, or how wise a man is, he feels that happiness is his indisputable right.
One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency. Arnold H. Glasow
#quotes When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
Greater is he who acts from love than he who acts from fear. Simeon Ben Eleazar
#quotes Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.
Business is never so healthy as when, like a chicken, it must do a certain amount of scratching around for what it gets. Henry Ford
The two hardest things to handle in life are failure & success. Anonymous
